programme.title: Quo Vadis TV

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Bad for Each Other
programme.desc: Dr. Tom Owen (Charlton Heston) is an Army doctor on leave to visit his mother, who still lives in the poor Pennsylvania mining town where he grew up. After falling in love with wealthy socialite Helen Curtis (Lizabeth Scott), Tom turns down a position as the local doctor and takes a lucrative job at an elite Pittsburgh clinic. Though he's happy with his newfound success and his recent engagement to Helen, a cave-in at the town mine forces Tom to decide where his heart really lies.

programme.title: Assignment -- Paris
programme.desc: Cocky investigative reporter Jimmy Race (Dana Andrews) and his idealistic rival, Jeanne Moray (Märta Torén), tangle over international espionage and Cold War tensions in Communist Hungary. While following an explosive story about an accused American spy, Jimmy inadvertently brings the unwanted attention of Hungarian agent Anton Borvitch (Donald Randolph) to Jeanne's ongoing investigation of possible collusion between Hungarian and Yugoslavian politicians, endangering both reporters' lives.

programme.title: Johnny O'Clock
programme.desc: When an employee at an illegal gambling den dies suspiciously, her sister, Nancy (Evelyn Keyes), looks into the situation and falls for Johnny O'Clock (Dick Powell), a suave partner in the underground casino. Selfish and non-committal by nature, Johnny slowly begins to return Nancy's affection and decides to run away with her, but conflict within his business threatens their plans. As Johnny tries to distance himself from the casino, his shady past comes back to haunt him.

programme.title: Beat the Devil
programme.desc: Billy and Maria Dannreuther are among a number of travelers stranded in Italy en route to Africa. While the Dannreuthers seem like an average couple, they have the same goal as Mrs. Gwendolen Chelm and some of their other shifty companions -- to lay claim to property that is supposedly rich with uranium.

programme.title: Hook, Line and Sinker

programme.title: The Buckskin Lady
programme.desc: Gambler Angela Medley (Patricia Medina) is courted by local gunman Slinger (Gerald Mohr), but she has feelings for Dr. Bruce Merritt (Richard Denning). After her father hustles Merritt out of some money, Angela promises to repay him quickly. But she loses a card game against Slinger and gets herself further into trouble. programme.title: The Fastest Gun Alive
programme.desc: Former gunslinger George Temple (Glenn Ford) wants to keep his gun-fighting days a secret as he builds a new life. It seems whenever Temple's prowess with a gun is discovered, he and his wife, Dora (Jeanne Crain), have to skip town before someone challenges him to a duel. After eventually settling in a small town as a quiet shopkeeper, a drunken Temple makes the mistake of showing off his skills. When the criminal Vinnie Harold (Broderick Crawford) catches wind of it, a showdown is imminent.

programme.title: A Bullet Is Waiting
programme.desc: Storms trap a Utah sheriff (Stephen McNally) and his prisoner (Rory Calhoun) in a coastal cabin with a professor's daughter (Jean Simmons).

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: When Mildred Pierce's wealthy husband leaves her for another woman, Mildred decides to raise her two daughters on her own. Despite Mildred's financial successes in the restaurant business, her oldest daughter, Veda, resents her mother for degrading their social status. In the midst of a police investigation after the death of her second husband, Mildred must evaluate her own freedom and her complicated relationship with her daughter.

programme.title: The Family Secret
programme.desc: After David Clark (John Derek) kills his drunk, violent friend Art, he explains to his lawyer father, Howard (Lee J. Cobb), that he acted in self-defense. Howard lets David decide whether or not to confess. Disappointed when David refuses to admit to his crime, Howard is further disturbed when district attorney George Redman (Santos Ortega) prepares to prosecute Joe Elsner (Whit Bissell), a bookie Art was in debt to. When his son still refuses to turn himself in, Howard agrees to defend Joe.

programme.title: Springfield Rifle
programme.desc: During the Civil War, Union forces stationed in Colorado are hampered by raiders who have been stealing their horses as they travel through the mountains. When several commanding officers begin to suspect a traitor is revealing troop movements, Maj. Lex Kearny (Gary Cooper) goes undercover to investigate. However, the assignment strains Kearny's relationship with his wife, Erin (Phyllis Thaxter), after he chooses to continue the operation instead of searching for their runaway son.

programme.title: Odd Man Out
programme.desc: A wounded fugitive's dark odyssey through the streets of Belfast. Following a "fundraising" robbery which goes horribly wrong, the badly injured, abandoned, and increasingly delirious IRA leader wanders the city in search of an escape route from the British authorities.

programme.desc: A group of former and current professional baseball players, along with a pair of country music stars, team up with outdoorsman, hunter and author Willie Robertson. Best known for his appearances on A&E's "Duck Dynasty," Robertson aids his co-owners of the Buck Commander Co. in the woods for deer season. Forming a bond and sharing a few laughs, Adam LaRoche, Ryan Langerhans, Tombo Martin, Luke Bryan and Jason Aldean use their signature tools to score big. Following the success of their company, the guys give viewers an inside look at the tools and knowledge of being a successful hunter.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: Racers Unchained with Paul Tracy is an interview show hosted by IndyCar champion Paul Tracy. With 31 career victories and a reputation for intensity both on and off the track, Tracy brings his signature no-holds-barred approach as he sits down with top names from motorsports and beyond, pulling back the curtain on the moments fans never got to hear - until now. Each episode delivers insider access and candor that only a racer like Tracy can provide, exploring the sport's past, present, and future with his trademark candor and curiosity. Guests: Max Papis, Bobby Rahal, Jimmy Johnson, Johnny O'Connell, Ray Evernham etc.

programme.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: A dog named Bella awakens her family just in time take cover as tornadoes hit Nashville in March 2020, but Bella goes missing; a huge dust storm called a "haboob" engulfs Phoenix, AZ.

programme.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
programme.desc: With his dad away, Mitch works with his older brother to get a stubborn wreck onto the road, but these brothers rarely see eye-to-eye; Glen, Todd and the crew improvise to offload some extreme cargo.

programme.title: Heavy Rescue: 401

programme.title: Weekend Recharge
programme.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which includes helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.

programme.desc: A beagle rescue organization; helping baby eagles in Massachusetts; saving trapped ducklings; saluting animal rescue heroes; adopting new pets.

programme.title: Dog Tales
programme.desc: Dog training, health, nutrition, behavior and grooming.

programme.title: Think Big
programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: Biz Kids
programme.desc: "Biz Kids" is an educational television show that teaches financial education and entrepreneurship to a preteen audience. It uses sketch comedy and young actors to explain basic economic concepts.

programme.title: Sports Stars of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Profiles of the top rookie, college and high-school talent in sports; current athletes share their experiences, advice and personal impressions of the road to stardom.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.desc: A man accuses his ex-girlfriend of using his credit card after he broke up with her; a delivery driver blames his customer after he is ticketed for honking his horn.

programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett

programme.title: Mathis Court With Judge Mathis
programme.desc: A man sues his ex-fiancée for keeping her engagement ring after their breakup; a car door is accidentally damaged after a friend's unwanted kiss.

programme.title: Mathis Court With Judge Mathis
programme.desc: Mobile tattoo artist seeks payment for his services at a party; woman sues after a specialized yoga class doesn't deliver as advertised.

programme.title: Justice for the People With Judge Milian
programme.desc: Cash-filled birthday cards are stolen from a party venue; a vacation rental property has an unwanted surprise.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E14 Unfinished Business After surviving a brutal massacre of wealthy settlers, Evan, Emma's estranged husband, comes to Sweetwater looking for shelter. When Evan wants to reconcile their relationship, Sam and the riders are suspicious of his intentions.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E9 Dead Cold Cash Sara Caruthers, the deceased widow of a bandit Lucas shot when he was a deputy marshal, has an unusal will to get revenge against McCain. It stipulates that $100,000 be divided among North Fork residents if Lucas dies within seven days of her death.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Schoolmaster Mr. Griswald is the new North Fork schoolmaster. As a harsh disciplinarian, he quickly clashes with Mark and his friend one too many times. When the boys decide to play hooky from school, they find big trouble when they get trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E4 A Dying Breed The cowboys head back to South Florida to move cattle across a 10-mile route for their new business partner. An old friend of Booger's grandfather leads the cattle drive and helps guide the cowboys through the swampy terrain. Reminiscing about the old days inspires Booger to organize a cattle drive of his own. The cowboys are spending more and more time on the road, and Kaley is struggling to keep things in order back at home. Cody and Misty move forward with their homebuilding plans, and they decide to host a groundbreaking party.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E5 Another Man's Treasure When a neighbor asks the guys for help with his unruly herd, the cowboys ride to his rescue. But this time the cattle refuse to cooperate, and the cowboys reluctantly decide to return another day after the herd settles down. Bubba invests in a group of horses in order to train them for ranch work and sell them at a profit. Cody sets out to discover whether anything of value is buried beneath some of his land. Booger gets permission from the city to hold an old-fashioned community cattle drive, and he works with his grandma to plan the festivities.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E11 The Legacy Lucas agrees to do a good deed for Pop, the town drunk who is dying, by going along with a story that his ranch is owned by Pop. When Pop's son, Philip, arrives from back east the story backfires and now his son wants restitution.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E12 The Baby Sitter A dance hall singer asks for Lucas' help in hiding her 6-month-old baby girl from her estranged, self-righteous husband after he comes to town demanding she give the baby to him. Lucas must deal with the consequences of safeguarding the infant.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E14 Unfinished Business After surviving a brutal massacre of wealthy settlers, Evan, Emma's estranged husband, comes to Sweetwater looking for shelter. When Evan wants to reconcile their relationship, Sam and the riders are suspicious of his intentions.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E9 Dead Cold Cash Sara Caruthers, the deceased widow of a bandit Lucas shot when he was a deputy marshal, has an unusal will to get revenge against McCain. It stipulates that $100,000 be divided among North Fork residents if Lucas dies within seven days of her death.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Schoolmaster Mr. Griswald is the new North Fork schoolmaster. As a harsh disciplinarian, he quickly clashes with Mark and his friend one too many times. When the boys decide to play hooky from school, they find big trouble when they get trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E6 Keep Them Doggies Rollin' The cowboys make a second attempt at rounding up their neighbor's unruly herd, and this time they come out on top as they finally manage to get the cattle penned up. Booger overcomes a number of obstacles in order to pull off an old-fashioned cattle drive right through the center of town. With a number of townsfolk along for the ride, it's slow going, but if he can impress the mayor, it just might become an annual event. Grandma gives the wives a lesson in cowgirl cooking, as they prepare swamp cabbage for the hungry cowboys on the cattle drive.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E7 Northern Exposure In the midst of a drought, the cowboys go in search of greener pastures and travel to northern Alabama in hopes of establishing a partnership with a successful rancher. Back at home, Misty decides to sell her beloved barrel horse to a junior racer, and she's so impressed by the young girl's positive attitude that she offers to give her some barrel racing lessons. Bubba splits his time between training his new ranch horses and coming to Kaley's aid during her difficult pregnancy. Booger decides to honor Grandma by compiling a cookbook full of her famous cowgirl recipes and stories.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E13 The Coward George Collins, a meek young man who loves to write, moves west for adventure. However, he is soon fired as a trail cook and beaten up by trailhands. Lucas takes George under his wing to help him discover his true qualities and inner strength.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E14 Surveyors Mark overhears men plotting to rob the North Fork Bank while at a surveying camp and tells Lucas about what he heard. When Lucas questions his story, Mark runs away from home. Lucas later learns Mark was telling the truth and helps capture the men.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E9 Law Comes to No Man's Land Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E8 William Sublette: King of the Fur Trade In his quest to become king of the fur trade, William Sublette revolutionizes the industry and puts his life on the line in the process. But he may risk too much when he rushes to save his comrades in the largest battle of the mountain man era.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Flint McCullough Story Flint returns home to Fort Bridger to visit the man who raised him. A run-in with an enemy brings back painful memories of his time in the Confederate Army and the tragedy that ensued after falling in love with Jean Yates, a young Mormon.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E15 Decoy While out on a run delivering a top-secret message, Cody encounters a wounded mountain man who wants him to care for his pet bear. Meanwhile, in Sweetwater, the other riders care for an abandoned baby.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E8 Top Hand Cheyenne turns down a job as top hand for a local rancher. Other ranchers who want his service soon confront him. Cheyenne discovers that he is now in the middle of a range war, which includes land and water rights.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E6 The Stranger An inspector comes from New Orleans to Virginia City intending to arrest Ben Cartwright for a murder committed 20 years ago. Ben now must travel to New Orleans to stand trial and considers withdrawing from the governor's race.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E14 Miss Bertie Bertie Hoakam, a lively little old lady, comes to North Fork. She tells Lucas and Micah of her plan to capture a ruthless bandit for the reward money to support herself. To everyone's surprise, she succeeds with her plan.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E16 Flowers by the Door Lucas is helping Cora Seevers mend a broken fence when Micah rides up to tell them about a murder nearby. The only clue at the scene is a pack of flower seeds. Lucas discovers that a sly book salesman offering free seeds to his victims is to blame.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E6 Keep Them Doggies Rollin' The cowboys make a second attempt at rounding up their neighbor's unruly herd, and this time they come out on top as they finally manage to get the cattle penned up. programme.desc: S1 E6 The Stranger An inspector comes from New Orleans to Virginia City intending to arrest Ben Cartwright for a murder committed 20 years ago. Ben now must travel to New Orleans to stand trial and considers withdrawing from the governor's race.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E14 Miss Bertie Bertie Hoakam, a lively little old lady, comes to North Fork. She tells Lucas and Micah of her plan to capture a ruthless bandit for the reward money to support herself. To everyone's surprise, she succeeds with her plan.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E16 Flowers by the Door Lucas is helping Cora Seevers mend a broken fence when Micah rides up to tell them about a murder nearby. The only clue at the scene is a pack of flower seeds. Lucas discovers that a sly book salesman offering free seeds to his victims is to blame.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E8 Gator Raid With new cattle operations in both south Florida and northern Alabama, the cowboys must divide and conquer in order to handle all of the work. In Florida, cattle are missing tails and calves are disappearing mysteriously, so Booger and Bubba head south to track down a predator. That leaves Cody to singlehandedly oversee an important cattle shipment at the ranch up north. Back at home, the guys convince Bubba to wear an empathy belly in hopes of teaching him to empathize with Kaley's pregnancy pain. The whole gang pitches in to help Matthew ace his school science project.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E9 Specialty Sales and Recipe Fails As the cowboys continue to expand their operation, they round up some of their cattle in north Alabama and ship them down to greener pastures in south Florida. Cody and Misty are looking for extra income but they are unsure if they have enough time in their busy schedule to stage another specialty cattle sale. Bubba's hard work pays off when he finds a buyer for the ranch horses he's been training. Booger and Jaclyn struggle to recreate Grandma's recipes for a cowboy cookbook, so they call the families together for a taste test and some honest feedback.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 Day of the Hunter A famous old frontiersman, with a reputation as the best rifleman around, challenges Luke to see who's really the best with a rifle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Mail Order Groom A mail-order husband arrives in North Fork, and finds not only a bride, but also harassment from two local troublemakers.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Bandit Queen Once a feared gunfighter and sheriff, the legendary Bat Masterson is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story of Pearl Hart, the first woman to rob a stagecoach in the Old West. Masterson tracks down Pearl's partner-in-crime, Joe Boot, who shares every daring and surprising detail from his wild days with the notorious Bandit Queen. In a time when outlaws and gunslingers captured the fascination of the American public, Pearl Hart was living proof that in the Wild West a woman could be just as infamous as a man.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Dalton Gang Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story behind the most brazen bank robbery of the Old West. Masterson tracks down the sole survivor of the Dalton Gang, who relives the horrible day when they attempted to rob two banks at the same time. The youngest of the Dalton brothers, Emmett Dalton describes how the gang was gunned down as they tried to make their getaway. Despite numerous gunshot wounds, Emmett lived to serve his time in prison and renounce his life of crime.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S3 E1 The Malachi Hobart Story Duke scouts a new passage through rough terrain. He meets a traveling preacher named Malachi Hobart during his trip. However, he soon discovers that Hobart is nothing more than a con man. Duke devises a plan to expose him.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E16 Daddy's Girl There is a new girl in Sweetwater, and she has eyes for Buck. However, Buck must contend with her rich, oppressive father. Meanwhile, the riders help a woman in need after the corrupt banker's henchmen kill her husband.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Last Comanchero Cheyenne tracks down and captures the leader of the last Comancheros, Rafe Larkin. Once back in town, he soon discovers that the townspeople demand Rafe's lynching since he sold weapons to the Indians.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E7 Escape to Ponderosa Three deserters escape from an Army stockade and hide at the Ponderosa. When a captain comes looking for them, Ben soon realizes how the prisoners are being treated and resolves to confront his good friend in charge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E17 Long Trek While escorting a killer named Stanley to North Fork to stand trial, Lucas and Marshal Micah Torrance endure harsh conditions crossing the desert. Micah is injured and their horses are lost. The prisoner taunts them but Lucas' endurance prevails.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Actress A dying friend of Lucas McCain's asks him to go to a nearby town to bring back his wife, Elizabeth, so he can see her one last time. Lucas agrees but is surprised to find a beautiful, young actress who is not interested in grieving over her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E8 Gator Raid With new cattle operations in both south Florida and northern Alabama, the cowboys must divide and conquer in order to handle all of the work. In Florida, cattle are missing tails and calves are disappearing mysteriously, so Booger and Bubba head south to track down a predator. programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E17 Long Trek While escorting a killer named Stanley to North Fork to stand trial, Lucas and Marshal Micah Torrance endure harsh conditions crossing the desert. Micah is injured and their horses are lost. The prisoner taunts them but Lucas' endurance prevails.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Actress A dying friend of Lucas McCain's asks him to go to a nearby town to bring back his wife, Elizabeth, so he can see her one last time. Lucas agrees but is surprised to find a beautiful, young actress who is not interested in grieving over her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E10 Generations to Come Booger and Bubba struggle to keep up with ranch work while Cody is busy with his specialty cattle sale. Much to Bubba's chagrin, Booger hires their ornery old hand Billy to pick up the slack. Cody manages to pack the sale barn with potential buyers, but will they open their wallets for the high-end cattle? Bubba and Kaley turn their dining room into a playroom for their expanding family. Booger begins collecting old stories and memories from Grandma to accompany the recipes in her cowboy cookbook.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E11 Let It Ripp The cowboys are busy processing cattle and preparing for an important shipment when a chute gets stuck, bringing work to a halt and risking time and money they can't afford to lose. Booger trains a cutting horse and enters it into its first competition. Cody organizes a campout for the youth at the Alabama Sheriff's Boys Ranch, and the guys share some of their cowboy wisdom with the hope of inspiring another generation to follow the cowboy way. Friends and family gather for a baby shower, where Bubba and Kaley reveal the name they've chosen for their new addition.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E17 A Case of Identity Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Visitor A pretty young widow named Ann Dodd passes through North Fork on her way to claim her inheritance. She and Lucas are immediately attracted to each other, but danger awaits as other heirs try to take Ann's life to get the inheritance for themselves.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Great Train Robbery Bat Masterson, former gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the story behind one of the country's greatest train robberies. Although Butch and Sundance are long gone, Masterson tracks down Sundance's former girlfriend, Etta Place, to draw out more details. To pull off the audacious robbery, they used official Union Pacific lanterns to signal the train and fool the engineer into believing a bridge was out. As Etta reluctantly relives the events of the robbery and its aftermath, it's obvious that she is still smitten by Sundance after all of these years.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Legend of the Blue-Eyed Apache When eleven-year-old Herman Lehmann is torn away from his frontier home by an Apache raiding party, he must adapt in order to survive. He soon forgets the life he unwillingly left behind and is adopted by an Apache family. For close to a decade, he lives as a Native American, learning their language and customs. Eventually, he even joins the same type of raiding party that separated him from his family. Though the years pass by, Herman's mother never gives up hope that she will be reunited with her son. One day, she hears a rumor of a blue-eyed Apache now living on a reservation. Could this be her long-lost son? Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Herman's mother to uncover the real story of the blue-eyed Apache.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Jud Steele Story A posse pursues Jud Steele, a wanted gunslinger, and his partner. They join the wagon train to rest their horses. Steele dies trying to steal fresh horses. Hawks returns his belongings to the sheriff, who says Steele died five years ago.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E17 Bulldog College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Gamble Cheyenne helps an old friend by helping her keep her saloon from crooked gamblers. The woman's daughter who has been back east in school, will be arriving back in town soon, but she knows nothing about how her mother earned money for her education.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Avenger Hoss and Joe desperately look for a way to prevent brothers Adam and Ben from being hanged for a crime. A stranger, Lassiter, comes to town in an attempt to find the truth and prove Adam and Ben's innocence.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E10 Generations to Come Booger and Bubba struggle to keep up with ranch work while Cody is busy with his specialty cattle sale. programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: Romance in the Wilds
programme.desc: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 Hero While hunting, Colly Vane encounters a dangerous outlaw, The Domino Kid, who forces Vane to shoot him. When he brings the body back to town, it's discovered he was shot in the back. Instead of being a hero, Vane faces danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 The Horse Traders Kansas Sawyer is Lucas' friend who was cheated in a horse-trading deal. Lucas investigates Colonel Bourbon's operation and discovers his illegal process. He also learns that the horse Sawyer bought was stolen and is being sought after by outlaws.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes' guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes' adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E6 Bass Reeves: Trailblazing Lawman After escaping the bonds of slavery, Bass Reeves takes refuge among the indigenous people of The Indian Territory, where he is welcomed into their culture. When the Civil War ends, his new-found tracking skills and fluency in native languages lead to his appointment as the first Black Deputy U.S. Marshal west of the Mississippi River. Though he faces discrimination from his peers, Reeves earns their respect when he accepts Judge Isaac Parker's daunting order to hunt down one of the most ruthless killers in The Indian Territory and bring him back dead or alive. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Judge Parker to learn more about the amazing career of Bass Reeves, who goes on to arrest 3,000 felons, kill 14 men in self-defense, and complete 32 years of service without being wounded.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S5 E1 Alias Bill Hawks Bill Hawks rides into a prairie town looking for his old Indian friend, but soon realizes he is not welcome. He discovers that the townspeople are drilling a well on his friend's land and won't give him any information on his whereabouts.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Romance in the Wilds
programme.desc: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 Hero While hunting, Colly Vane encounters a dangerous outlaw, The Domino Kid, who forces Vane to shoot him. When he brings the body back to town, it's discovered he was shot in the back. Instead of being a hero, Vane faces danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 The Horse Traders Kansas Sawyer is Lucas' friend who was cheated in a horse-trading deal. Lucas investigates Colonel Bourbon's operation and discovers his illegal process. He also learns that the horse Sawyer bought was stolen and is being sought after by outlaws.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes' guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes' adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E6 Bass Reeves: Trailblazing Lawman After escaping the bonds of slavery, Bass Reeves takes refuge among the indigenous people of The Indian Territory, where he is welcomed into their culture. When the Civil War ends, his new-found tracking skills and fluency in native languages lead to his appointment as the first Black Deputy U.S. Marshal west of the Mississippi River. Though he faces discrimination from his peers, Reeves earns their respect when he accepts Judge Isaac Parker's daunting order to hunt down one of the most ruthless killers in The Indian Territory and bring him back dead or alive. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Judge Parker to learn more about the amazing career of Bass Reeves, who goes on to arrest 3,000 felons, kill 14 men in self-defense, and complete 32 years of service without being wounded.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S5 E1 Alias Bill Hawks Bill Hawks rides into a prairie town looking for his old Indian friend, but soon realizes he is not welcome. He discovers that the townspeople are drilling a well on his friend's land and won't give him any information on his whereabouts.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Top Story

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: (2021) Dystopian crime thriller sequel. The NFFA are back. The Purge is back. Racists feel empowered. And when migrants start to go missing in Texas, it seems like the Purge will never end.

programme.title: Piggy
programme.desc: (2022) Suspenseful slasher horror starring Laura Galán as a bullied teenager whose tormentors get what's coming to 'em, but perhaps not in a way she'd fully support... In Spanish/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: 13 Rue Madeleine
programme.desc: (1947) WWII drama. James Cagney stars as the tough US secret agent overseeing a special mission to discover the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their flying bombs.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: (1955) Cold War-influenced western starring Glenn Ford and Edward G Robinson. A smallholder stands alone against the expansionist plans and brutal tactics of a tyrannical rancher.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: (1954) Crime-comedy starring Alec Guinness. A priest is tasked with accompanying a priceless religious artifact from London to Rome. But the prolific thief Flambeau is hot on his trail...

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: (1984) George C Scott stars in Clive Donner's adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic festive fantasy. The miserly curmudgeon Ebenezer Scrooge is visited by three ghosts of Christmas.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: (2019) Visually stunning sci-fi starring Brad Pitt as a famously cool astronaut sent to the edges of the solar system to save Earth from deadly power surges. With Tommy Lee Jones.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly-tinged but ultimately feel-good comedy starring Tom Hanks as a grumpy misanthrope who spends his time badgering people into following society's rules. But why is he like this?

programme.title: Nuns on the Run
programme.desc: (1990) Eric Idle and Robbie Coltrane star as small-time crooks who accidentally steal £1m and are forced to hide in a convent to escape both the police and the mob.

programme.title: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
programme.desc: (2021) Jessica Chastain puts in a barnstorming performance as the glitzy televangelist in the kind of real-life rise and fall that just seems made for the movies. With Andrew Garfield.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: (1957) Gripping drama with Robert Beatty. An expert team races against the clock to save a six-year-old boy who's been trapped in a seemingly impregnable bank vault.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: (1954) Tough western. A cavalry doctor (Robert Francis) discovers a Native American tribe is dying of malaria, but his by-the-book captain (Phil Carey) refuses to allow their treatment.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: (1957) Drama with Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon. Two friends agree to smuggle a mysterious European woman across the border, but she soon has them at each other's throats.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: (1993) Romantic comedy with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. A bereaved man gets another chance at love when his son puts him on a radio talk show.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: (1999) Drama with Tom Hanks and Michael Clarke Duncan. Strange events occur when a man convicted of raping and murdering two young girls arrives on death row in a Louisiana prison.

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland
programme.desc: (2006) Oscar and BAFTA-winning Forest Whitaker stars as Idi Amin - the murderous Ugandan dictator, who mesmerises a young Scottish doctor, played by James McAvoy.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Saraband for Dead Lovers
programme.desc: (1948) Historical drama starring Joan Greenwood and Stewart Granger. Princess Dorothea marries the future king of England. But then she meets a Swedish count...

programme.title: Storm over the Nile
programme.desc: (1955) Drama. Anthony Steel stars as a disgraced soldier who, during the British army's 1898 campaign in Sudan, goes way beyond the call of duty to prove his courage. With Laurence Harvey.

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: (1961) World War II comedy starring Jack Lemmon. A luckless naval lieutenant is duped into commanding a dangerous mission into enemy territory during the Battle of the Bismarck Sea.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: (1952) Civil War-era Western. A unit of Confederate soldiers attack a Union troop to steal gold. Learning that the war is over, they must finish the mission in disguise.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: (2019) Will Smith stars in Ang Lee's action-thriller as both an over-the-hill hitman and the young clone of himself sent to take him out. With Clive Owen.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies

programme.desc: This Island Isn't Big Enough...: Classic US action drama series. Thomas, TC and Higgins search for Rick and a boatload of passengers who have gone missing at sea during a cruise. S6 Ep13

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: The People Importers: Freelance troubleshooter Simon Templar embarks on another case. The Saint investigates a racket in which illegal immigrants are being smuggled into Britain. S6 Ep8

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Know When to Fold: US documentary series. After buying a huge pottery collection in Atlanta, Mike Wolff and Frank Fritz find out whether their gamble has paid off or not. S1 Ep10

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Cherry Healey, Dallas Campbell, Ria Hebden and Robert Peston hope to win thousands of pounds for their chosen charity when they take on one of the Chasers. S13 Ep3

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The Big Melt: Nail-biting documentary series. An unprecedented 17-truck convoy which includes the largest load of the season crosses the ice, and Rick Yemm has a confrontation. S1 Ep9

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Action thriller film sequel starring Clint Eastwood and Liam Neeson, 1988. 'Dirty' Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities that includes himself.

programme.title: FYI Daily
programme.desc: Latest news from the world of entertainment.

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Action thriller film sequel starring Clint Eastwood and Liam Neeson, 1988. 'Dirty' Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities that includes himself.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Dynamite
programme.desc: Hard-hitting action from the world of All Elite Wrestling - the roster features world-class talent including Jon Moxley, Chris Jericho, Bryan Danielson and Claudio Castagnoli.

programme.title: Dark Side of the Ring
programme.desc: The Many Faces of Luna Vachon: Wrestling documentary series. A striking ring villain, Luna Vachon was a ground-breaking physical performer who battled mental illness and addiction. S3 Ep12

programme.title: BattleBots
programme.desc: Bad Blood: US robot combat series. Two teams with bad blood between them collide in the Main Event as community college team Madcatter take on Ethan Kurtz's Riptide. S7 Ep8

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Football Rivalries: Man Utd v Liverpool
programme.desc: Clips from famous matches that feature Liverpool against Manchester United that include the 1977 FA Cup Final.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Brother Hood: Harry is offered an assignment by the reclusive industrial magnate Bela Karoleo. S1 Ep2

programme.title: Cadfael
programme.desc: The Rose Rent: Drama series about a monk who solves medieval mysteries. Cadfael looks into a spate of murders related to the courting of a rich and attractive merchant's widow. S3 Ep1

programme.title: The Motorbike Show
programme.desc: Motorcycle guru Henry Cole is in the Yorkshire Dales to take in the delights of some of the UK's best motorcycling roads, and he also tells the story of motorbike brand Indian. S8 Ep5

programme.title: ITV Racing: The Opening Show
programme.desc: Oli Bell and the team are at Ascot ahead of British Champions Day 2025, where there are seven superb races to enjoy.

programme.title: The Big Match Revisited
programme.desc: Brian Moore introduces FA Cup Fourth Round action from January 1976 including Derby County against Liverpool, Leeds United vs Crystal Palace, and Charlton Athletic vs Portsmouth. S9 Ep20

programme.title: World of Sport
programme.desc: Kings of the Canvas: Richard Henwood takes a look back at the glory days of British wrestling with some classic action from the archives.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Bigfoot in Alabama: US documentary series. Mike and Frank travel through the Deep South of America and meet a car hobbyist whose yard resembles a vintage parking lot. S1 Ep9

programme.title: Sharpe
programme.desc: Sharpe's Battle: Napoleonic War-based action-adventure. September 1813 - Sharpe and his men come across a scene of devastation in the town of Casa Antiga while in the Spanish hills. S3 Ep2

programme.desc: Action from the 2025-26 Gallagher PREM as the Leicester Tigers take on Bath Rugby at Mattioli Woods Welford Road Stadium for the first time since last season's final at Twickenham.
